did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.physdesc: Selections from this collection have been digitized and are available online.
did.abstract: Postcards from Appalachia contains sixty-nine 3"x5" postcards depicting various landmarks, locations, and scenery in the Appalachian region during the early 1900s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Postcards from Appalachia must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Postcards from Appalachia, Ms2015-032, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Postcards from Appalachia were purchased by Special Collections in 1991.

altformavail.head: Alternate Form Available
altformavail.p: Selections from this collection have been digitized and are available online.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Postcards from Appalachia was completed in July 2015.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains sixty-nine 3" x 5" postcards depicting various locations in the Appalachian region. Postcards show scenery from locations in Tennessee and Kentucky as well as Abington, Bristol, Harrisonburg, Radford, Roanoke, and Tazewell, Virginia. The VPI Mess Hall and Student Activities Buildings and campus quadrangles of Roanoke College are shown on postcards. Other postcards depict historic landmarks such as Excelsior Pocahontas Smokeless Coal Mines No 1. and 2, The Hotel Roanoke, Hotel Patrick Henry, The Old Forge of Clifton Forge, and The Barter Theatre.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by type of material.
